title: Add more product options to the home catalog (Jacket, Half Pant, Full Pant, Football T-Shirt)

requirements.text: Extend the seeded product catalog to include additional product options: Jacket, Half Pant, Full Pant, and Football T-Shirt (English names), so these products appear on the home page product grid and can be opened in the product details view and added to the cart like existing products.

quotes: Build home page and add jacket.half pant.fullpant.football t shirt more product options

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/data/products.ts` includes new `Product` entries for: "Jacket", "Half Pant", "Full Pant", and "Football T-Shirt" with unique `id` values, `price` values, English `description` text, and a non-empty `images` array for each.
The home page product list displays the newly added products alongside the existing seeded products without layout issues.
Each newly added product can be opened in the product details view and shows its name, price, description, and images.
Each newly added product can be added to the cart from both the product list and product details views, and the header cart count updates accordingly.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.
Backend must remain single-actor; only add backend changes if required (not required for this request).
nonGoals: Implementing new backend product APIs or persisting a product catalog in the backend.
Adding new pages beyond the existing home/product details/cart/checkout/order views.
Changing the existing visual theme unless required to accommodate the added products.
